about_the_game:
The Payday Gang gets contacted with an offer. Gemma McShay offers a new and lucrative opportunity in Texas. Her first shipment to the crew contains new outfits, letting the heisters fit in as they head southbound to Texas.

The Southbound Tailor Pack is also included in the Midland Bundle. Please note that if this DLC is purchased separately, the bundle will become unavailable for purchase.

The Following is included in Southbound Tailor Pack:
2 Outfits with variations
4 Gloves
2 Masks with variations

New outfits
The following outfits are included in Southbound Tailor Pack:
    Trailblazer With variations
    • Modern
    • Classic
    • Denim
    • Rogue
    Rough RiderWith variations
    • Prestige
    • Woodland
    • Midnight
    • Chill
Masks
The following masks are included in Southbound Tailor Pack:
Each variation is a separate mask in the inventory
    Baseball Cap With variations
    • Blood Money
    • Don't Mess With Texas
    • Speedway
    Cowboy Hat With variations
    • Lone Star
    • Open Plain
    • El Capitan
    • Triggerman
Gloves
The following gloves are included in Southbound Tailor Pack:
  • Untamed
  • True Grit
  • Bandido
  • Rodeo Star
